resources.string: Error
Internal Error
Information
Select a credential - %s
Select a credential
For security reasons it is advised to remove the chip card from the terminal.
The authentication failed!
The following error was returned by the system:
The service provider allows you to use several credential and you have currently more than one valid credential available. Please select the credential to use in the selection box below.
Another authentication process is already running
The determination of a valid "refreshURL" failed.
eService indicated an error
An error occurred during the authentication process.
A certificate error occurred.
There is a mismatch between the communication certificates and the certificate description.
Result returned from server is not OK (%d).
Unknown security protocol %s requested.
The dispatched method threw an exception.
Failed to marshal JAXB object.
Invalid number of CertificateDescription elements in EAC1InpputType.
Invalid number of Signature elements in EACAdditionalType.
An internal error occurred.
An error occurred while establishing the TLS connection.
The TCToken contains an invalid URL which should have been detected before.
Unsupported XML parser feature requested.
Refresh address in TCToken is invalid. This indicates an error in the TCToken verification.
UTF-8 encoding is not supported. This should never be the case.
Specified URL is not a https-URL.
Received a result code %d '%s' from server.
This happened probably on the side of the eService because the TCToken does not contain required information.
Invalid %s in TCToken.
Invalid RefreshAddress.
The RefreshAddress is not conform to the same origin policy.
Element %s is required.
No refreshAddress available.
No ServerAddress given in the TCToken.
TCToken is malformed and could not be parsed.
No TCToken found in the given data.
The tcTokenURL parameter contains an invalid URL: %s
Malformed %s URL
%s is not a https URL.
Unrecoverable communication error occurred
Error redirect URL is not an URL.
No redirect address available for an error redirect.
Failed to determine a valid "refreshURL".
Failed to initialize proxy.
Invalid HTTP message received.
The validation of the content of the received message failed.
The validation of a received message was not possible.
The insertion of a requested card was canceled.
You have canceled the selection of a card.
A parameter containing the activation information is missing.
No suitable set of parameters given in the request.
No valid TCToken available in request.
Failure in PACE authentication.
Failed to establish a connection to the eID-Server.
PAOS connection closed and reestablishment is forbidden.
Failed to deliver or receive PAOS HTTP message.
Invalid http status code %d received from the PAOS endpoint.
MessageID from result doesn't match.
No MessageID in PAOS header.
The target server failed to respond.
Failed to create SOAP message instance from given JAXB message.
An unknown exception occurred while communicating with the smart card.
The PAOS process has been cancelled.
The schema validation of a PAOS message failed.
Failed to parse FCP.
An attempt was made to redirect to an invalid page.
Failed to convert SubjectURL to URL class.
Maximum number of redirects exceeded.
Resource could not be retrieved. Missing Location header in HTTP response.
Unsupported binding in TCToken.
The same origin policy is violated for the second channel (TLS-2).
Failed to retrieve the TCToken.
Unknown connection handle in the DIDAuthenticate message.
An unknown error occurred. The original error message is:
Failed to connect to card.
